con:configuration.script: def sdf = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd") return sdf.format(new Date()) + "T08:59:00.000-04:00"

con:request.name: SubmitPPIPaymentUsingWallet
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="https://www.velocitypayment.com/ws" xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI" xmlns:ppip="http://www.ePayments.com/PPIPayment"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:SubmitPPIPaymentUsingWallet> <!--Optional:--> <ws:token> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <ppi:UserName>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#AT_Username}</ppi:UserName> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Password>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#AT_Password}</ppi:Password> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:PPITransactionRequestId>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#AT_RequestID}</ppi:PPITransactionRequestId><ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#AT_Identifier}</ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken> </ws:token> <!--Optional:--> <ws:ppiWalletPayment Notes="${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#Notes}"> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:AdditionalInfo> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ppi:Fees> <ppip:FeeType>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#FeeType}</ppip:FeeType> <ppip:Amount>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#FeeAmount}</ppip:Amount> </ppi:Fees> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ppi:PaymentSegment> <ppip:Amount>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#SegmentAmount}</ppip:Amount><ppip:SegmentType>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#SegmentType}</ppip:SegmentType> <!--Optional:-->
</ppi:PaymentSegment> <!--Optional:-->
<ppi:PaymentType>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#PaymentType}</ppi:PaymentType><ppi:ProcessDate>${DataGenProcessDate#ProcessDateToday}</ppi:ProcessDate> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
</ppi:AdditionalInfo> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Customer> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <ppi:AddressLine1>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_AL1}</ppi:AddressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:AddressLine2>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_AL2}</ppi:AddressLine2> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Country>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Country}</ppi:Country> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:EmailAddress>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Email}</ppi:EmailAddress> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:FirstName>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_FirstName}</ppi:FirstName> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:LastName>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_LastName}</ppi:LastName> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:MiddleInitial>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_MI}</ppi:MiddleInitial> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Notes>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Notest}</ppi:Notes> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:PhoneNumber>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Phone}</ppi:PhoneNumber> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Zip>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_ZIP}</ppi:Zip> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Username>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Username}</ppi:Username><ppi:Password>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Password}</ppi:Password> </ppi:Customer> <!--Optional:-->
<ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_PreAuthOnly}</ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly> <ppi:ClientAccountNumber>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_CAN}</ppi:ClientAccountNumber><ppi:PaymentSource>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_PaymentSource}</ppi:PaymentSource><ppi:WalletID>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#WalletID}</ppi:WalletID><ppi:PaymentAccountToken>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#PaymentAcToken}</ppi:PaymentAccountToken> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</ws:ppiWalletPayment> </ws:SubmitPPIPaymentUsingWallet> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
